adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the US state of Virginia or its inhabitants.
Relating to or made from a type of tobacco grown and manufactured in Virginia.
examples: his favorite blend of Virginian tobacco
the scent of a Virginian cigarette was wafted to them

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the US state of Virginia.
examples: a Virginian who did social work

noun.description: A type of tobacco grown and manufactured in Virginia.
examples: he was the sort of type that would only appreciate and only smoke Virginian
